Uses of Class
org.jboss.modcluster.config.builder.NodeConfigurationBuilder

  • Packages that use NodeConfigurationBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.jboss.modcluster.config.builder
    Package containing a set of public configuration builders replacing legacy Java beans-style configuration.

    • Uses of NodeConfigurationBuilder in org.jboss.modcluster.config.builder

      Methods in org.jboss.modcluster.config.builder that return NodeConfigurationBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NodeConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.node()
      Builder for proxy node configuration.
      NodeConfigurationBuilder ModClusterConfigurationBuilder.node() 
      NodeConfigurationBuilder NodeConfigurationBuilder.setBalancer(String balancer)
      Sets the name of the balancer.
      NodeConfigurationBuilder NodeConfigurationBuilder.setFlushPackets(boolean flushPackets)
      Controls flushing of packets.
      NodeConfigurationBuilder NodeConfigurationBuilder.setFlushWait(int flushWait)
      Sets time to wait before flushing packets.
      NodeConfigurationBuilder NodeConfigurationBuilder.setLoadBalancingGroup(String loadBalancingGroup)
      Indicates the group of servers to which this node belongs.
      NodeConfigurationBuilder NodeConfigurationBuilder.setNodeTimeout(int nodeTimeout)
      Sets maximum time in seconds for idle connections the proxy will wait to connect to the node.
      NodeConfigurationBuilder NodeConfigurationBuilder.setPing(int ping)
      Sets time to wait for a pong answer to a ping.
      NodeConfigurationBuilder NodeConfigurationBuilder.setSmax(int smax)
      Sets soft maximum inactive connection count.
      NodeConfigurationBuilder NodeConfigurationBuilder.setTtl(int ttl)
      Sets maximum time on seconds for idle connections above smax.
